char_info.desc: The Maiden Who Converts Determination to Strength

a0.speaker: Marisa:
a0.dialogue: Can you even call this a stage? I didn't receive any glowsticks at the very mere entrance.

a1.speaker: Marisa:
a1.dialogue: Maybe there are glowsticks but they are shaped like that heretical object I might have seen before...

a2.speaker: Marisa:
a2.dialogue: But by the way, why does the ground look impure? I guess that the mastermind isn't doing something right.

a3.dialogue: Who's there? I heard someone blaspheming Milady...

a4.speaker: Emiri:
a4.dialogue: But wait... is this an impostor of me, mingling among us in order to infiltrate the concert?

a5.speaker: Marisa:
a5.dialogue: Definitely not. From what I sense, you might be an envoy of that ditzy archangel I encountered a while ago.

a6.speaker: Emiri:
a6.dialogue: Exactly. A few years ago, my cousin was murdered by a bunch of Crimsonite grunts.

a7.speaker: Emiri:
a7.dialogue: I thought everything was over until the Archangel came and gave me the divine courage that I currently have.

a8.speaker: Emiri:
a8.dialogue: It prevents my own self from suffering death.

a9.speaker: Marisa:
a9.dialogue: Nonsense. You are exuding the smug area of that fish youkai I might have seen during a trip to Kourindou.

a10.speaker: Emiri:
a10.dialogue: You know what? You are the most irreverent being I have ever seen. I am feeling it.

a11.speaker: Emiri:
a11.dialogue: You have insulted the Archangel once, and this time you rebound hard on me as an act of blasphemy.

a12.speaker: Marisa:
a12.dialogue: Oh heck no. I have to beat the heck out of you.

a13.speaker: Marisa:
a13.dialogue: Why be a magician, when you can be a slayer of such a being like an angel?

a14.speaker: Emiri:
a14.dialogue: You think you are kind of a big shot who can defeat anything? Well, youâ€™re gonna have to try a little harder than that.
